item.description:
Hello to all fellow soles! You probably haven't seen me and Bella as much as you normally would, as I have been busy painting and getting ready for my upcoming Art Exhibition.

I would like to extend an invitation to all of you to come and see my work and the work of other local artists.

The exhibition will be held on January 25th from 10 - 5 at the Radisson Hotel in Manchester (Elm St).

It will be linked with the Home Show which should be fun and inspiring.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: The exhibition is in the Ballroom. Let's meet at Adele's area.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Adele's art exhibition at the Radisson 10am - 5pm
